Title: Apple
Writer: David Shore (developed by), Jae-Beom Park (based on the Korean Broadcasting System television series by), David Renaud, Johanna Lee (executive story editor), David Renaud (story editor), Karen Struck (story editor), Lloyd Gilyard Jr. (staff writer)
Actors: Freddie Highmore, Nicholas Gonzalez, Antonia Thomas, Chuku Modu
Plot: During a robbery at the grocery mart Dr. Shaun Murphy is shopping at, his communication limitations puts lives at risk. Meanwhile, after Shaun's traumatic day, Dr. Aaron Glassman worries that he isn't doing enough to help Shaun.
